title: The Cub & The Caterpillar: Episode Eight - With Lou Wilson
itunes:title: The Cub & The Caterpillar: Episode Eight - With Lou Wilson
description:
Our heroes finally arrive at the White Twins! But wait, who is this mysterious stranger? What are these voices that haunt him so? Who killed Laura Palmer?? Oh, wait, that last one was Twin Peaks. Find out the answers to the first two questions on this week’s scintillating episode of The Cub and the Caterpillar: A Wagadu Tale, with special guest Lou Wilson!!!


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for access to our post-show discussion, The Wagadu Watch, Bonus Episodes and your Shirefolk Shoutout.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

Theme Music by Jonathan Charles

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
